title: Kajiyashiki
marks:
Signature, Title , Marks, Inscription, and Label
 LLC: [ よし田 ] (Yoshida); LRC, in pencil: [Hiroshi Y
description: rocky shore of a waterway; multicolored rocks dominate the foreground and along LR edge; water in middle ground; a cluster of buildings at center; silhouette of tree-covered bluff at UL, large, snowy mountain in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
